description: A financial statement for a bank account listing transaction summaries for a specific duration

summary_desc.instruction: Description of the line item for the account summary table

summary_amount.instruction: Dollar amount for the corresponding summary item

date.instruction: Date of the transaction in MM/DD/YYYY format

withdrawals.instruction: dollar amount of withdrawal for this transaction

deposits.instruction: Dollar amount of deposits for this transaction

balance.instruction: Balance amount in the account including this transaction
